AsmtQstnRespRecommendation.name: AsmtQstnRespRecommendation
AsmtQstnRespRecommendation.description: Maps an assessment question’s response to the recommendation it has to provide for a care plan. Recommendations can be problems, goals, interventions, or other assessments.

AssessmentQuestionVersionId.description: The assessment question whose response is mapped to a recommendation.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time when the record was last viewed.

OmniProcessId.description: The assessment that this question-response-recommendation mapping is valid for. If a response to a question is mapped to the same recommendation, regardless of what assessment it’s a part of, then leave this field blank.

RecommendationReferenceId.description: The problem, goal, interventions, or assessment that a response to a question is mapped to.

TextResponse.description: The response to a question that a recommendation is mapped to.
